Articles.Content:
It's always a joy working together on projects. We are planning a Series of Videos for this Construction Site, reason being we have a few builds and we agreed shorter videos are a little better then longer ones. This one contains a Conveyor Built by @klond ....... with a Tensioner? These type builds do motivate me to build things to add to the project. At first we tried a Watermill that wasn't coming together as planned, that's why we have a sort of Rain Barrel here at the Cement Plant (Sorta). Later it became what you see here. We hope you enjoy and follow this Series, keep in mind these could have a long time between each.

Construction Site
Part: 1

Boy we've done a few projects together now - kayak races, street fair, windturbine repair, bridge stuff, etc.  Castille7 and I have done everything we can to make this single-player game a co-op game.

 Thanks for all the hard audio/video work.  Your silo totally functions and the job site looks great.  Driving skills, we'll, let's leave that up to the viewer .

It adds a bit of speed and brought forth an uncontrolled giggle after staring so hard trying to get how you did the belt. Certainly made me think of one bored kerbal in the truck in a hurry to make hes/her delivery. Can the truck unload at site ? the gate looks functional but dose it tilt?

What I'm trying to say is I liked it.

1 hour ago, KandoKris said:

the gate looks functional but dose it tilt?

Yes the Truck is functional, it Kando! ...... (It will be in action in a future video).....leak!

 

Edited March 1, 2019 by Castille7

Wow, the lag during that video must have been incredible! I salute you, and your smoking hard-drive. 

Happy Explosions!
